messages.content: Our area has long been served by top quality Liberal Democrat MPs from David Penhaligon and Paul Tyler to Matthew Taylor and Stephen Gilbert. With our country in a real crisis, and Cornwall sorely needing a strong voice at Westminster, now is the time to elect our next Lib Dem MP, Tim Styles.

Tim has spent his whole life serving the public. He joined the Royal Navy straight out of school, serving on aircraft carriers, HMS Hermes, HMS Bulwark and HMS Ark Royal. After his military service he joined the Police force, working in the Met and then Devon and Cornwall Police before putting himself through college to train as a lawyer.
Tim and the Liberal Democrats would end the Brexit chaos that has engulfed our country and help build a strong and independent minded Cornwall at the heart of a truly Great Britain.

issues.brexitEurope: Tim and the Liberal Democrats would end the Brexit chaos that has engulfed our country.

politicalExperience.achievements: Serving on aircraft carriers, HMS Hermes, HMS Bulwark and HMS Ark Royal.
Working in the Met and then Devon and Cornwall Police.
Trained as a lawyer after putting himself through college.
